ygData.subject: The Return of Zero
ygData.msgSnippet: Inside  the Chivtron base, one of the CR chambers begins to make a beeping sound. The doors then open and with a whoosh of steam a Blue and white Robot steps

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Inside  the Chivtron base, one of the CR chambers begins to make a beeping 
sound. The doors then open and with a whoosh of steam a Blue and white Robot 
steps from it. The figures wings curl around him as a white metal feather 
falls to the ground. He hears the sounds of battle coming from outside and 
his optics begin to glow a bright green. He quickly runs through the halls of 
the base as he heads to the exit which he reaches in a few short minutes. he 
then presses a button causing the door open just enough for him to slide out 
through which he does before it closes again. Once out in the sunlight the 
bot is revealed to be... Zero, the Maximal who had helped the Chivtrons in 
the last battle they were in against the Decepticons only to be placed into 
Stasis lock by his brother. He looks around and catches a glipse of 
Shadowstar and Luzbel.

Zero: "I've been in the CR chamber too long. This base is under attack 
again... now I must help."

Zero quickly flys up to Prowl and Shadowstar and draws his beam sabre which 
he uses to slash at Shadowstar as he charges at prowl.

Zero: "Need some help?"

--part1_21.188a7d42.2991d6f1_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
